Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

Interface ModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InfixCalc, RevPolishCalc
public interface ModelInterface
An interface to make sure calculator classes have the ability to evaluate an expression.
Author:
bensh

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    float
    evaluate(String expression)
    Evaluates a String expression into a float by parsing into a calculator algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      float evaluate(String expression) throws InvalidExpressionException, BadTypeException
      Evaluates a String expression into a float by parsing into a calculator algorithm.
      Parameters:
      expression - a string expression made up of an inputed mathematical expression
      Returns:
      the evaluated float
      Throws:
      InvalidExpressionException - exception thrown when an entered expression does not work with the calculators algorithm, meaning its an incorrect/unusable expression
      BadTypeException - an exception thrown when you try to get the value from an Entry but its storing a different type
